data.name: Touhou Big Big Battle - BBB stars
data.detailed_description:
Use the《Touhou Big Big Battle》’s BBBStars support pack to quickly unlock the in game currency, can be used to purchase items such as minions and skins that you’ll, and you’d need, giving you a hand on the battlefield. The pack contains 1000 BBB Stars, that can be used to purchase minion, skins, avatar as well as emotes. At the same time, by purchasing this pack, you will also receive the avatar “I am a Kadama”

《Touhou Big Big Battle》Newbie Star support pack contains：
1000 BBB Stars
Avarar- I am a Kadama
Avarar- Yakumo Ran

  • Processor: 2 Core CPU 主频2.8Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 10
